com.orgsync.api

Interface FormsResource


  • public interface FormsResource

    Access to the forms resource from the OrgSync API. This allows a client to get all forms, get forms for an org, get a single form, and get a form submission.

    See: https://api.orgsync.com/api/docs/v2/forms

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Form>> getForm(int formId)
      Get a single form.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Form>> getForm(int formId, String status)
      Get a single form.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Form>>> getForms()
      Get all of the forms for this community.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<FormSubmission>> getFormSubmission(int submissionId)
      A the form submission with the given id.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Form>>> getOrgForms(int orgId)
      Get all of the forms for a single org.

        Get all of the forms for this community.

        Parameters:
